author: rahul
msg: Move to standard m2 directory layout:
Related changes to POM and tests.

author: veithen
msg: Work around a problem in the XMLStreamWriter of the StAX reference implementation, which fails to handle masked namespace bindings in the expected way. The solution is to implement all the namespace context related methods in a wrapper and only invoke methods on the underlying writer that don't require information from the namespace context. Note that the same technique could probably be used to work around the non conformance of XLXP.

author: jeremias
msg: Demo file for bleed and crop marks.

author: jeremias
msg: Added an initial set of extensions for prepress support (fox:bleed, fox:crop-offset, fox:crop-box and fox:scale). This is currently supported only by PDF and Java2D renderers.
- crop box expands from trim box rather than the bleed box.
- disabled the border around every page in Java2DRenderer.
- if background painting is enabled for the Java2DRenderer, it uses the bleed box rather than the trim box.

author: veithen
msg: Changed isSetPrefixBeforeStartElement so that it assumes that by default a StAX implementation conforms to the StAX specs and only switches to the non-compliant behavior for XLXP.
